messages.text: All right, soI suggest you confiscate my phone
It's only ten o'clock. I can't sleep, husband
I want to talk about the case.
Then let me tell you something
I tried, starting with the victim.
But he doesn't have any friends
However, he doesn't seem to love me.
You were happy when you were youngï¼ŒI do housework every day. I didn't like being a child at all
My mother preferred sons to daughters
Honey, if I wasn't married now, I might not be able to live
Honey, I want to give it to my dad
Honey, I want to overturn my father's case
I need a lawyer. Would you like to be my lawyer
Honey, if you think about it, if you lose...
Whoo, honey, court's coming soon. I'm so nervous
How can I be strong? I lived by myself at the beginning of college, and the tuition was earned by myself. How can I be strong when I become a lawyer now
Why did I become a lawyer? I did it for this case, but after 10 years, I haven't got a clue
Honey, listen to what I'm going to say
I'm, I'm sick. I'm really sick.
See for yourself, and try not to cry
I don't want to keep him
The doctor asked me to stay in the hospital today
I don't want to eat anything
It's okay. It will be uncomfortable after chemotherapy. It will be like this these days
Don't get too close to me. It smells. It stinks.
Why did you let me hypnotize dad died? Why?Collapse
Didn't I go to see dad? I saw him.
I need a lead. I can't drop my dad's case.
Well, get up slowly, fall down
